thread.title: Listen to how loudly Colts fans booed Tom Brady - Patriots
thread.title_full: Listen to how loudly Colts fans booed Tom Brady - Patriots

author: Chris Greenberg
title: Listen to how loudly Colts fans booed Tom Brady - Patriots
text:
Patriots fans apparently weren’t the only ones worked up ahead of the Deflategate grudge match on Sunday night.
Colts fans enthusiastically booed Patriots quarterback Tom Brady the first few times they got a glimpse of him on Sunday night in Indianpolis. The boos began when Brady took the field for pregame warmups at Lucas Oil Stadium.
Watching #luck12 warm up and Brady came out. #boo pic.twitter.com/i1esrfiuqG
— Mike Davenport (@lvillechevydude) October 18, 2015 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below The naysayers may have been even louder when Brady and the Patriots’ offense took the field for their first drive of the game.
1st offensive play from scrimmage & BOO birds are out. Colts offsides & Brady completes a pass. #DeflategateRevenge pic.twitter.com/2lfeeTFYfM
— Bryan Salmond (@BSalSportsGuy25) October 19, 2015 PHOTOS: Colts fans mock Patriots with Deflategate signs
